review_data.title: UNFORGETTABLE
review_data.content: Isebahnli is one of these restaurants that will remain in your mind for ever. Tiny but charming ambiance enhancing the amount of time you decide to spend enjoying an exquisite meal based on fresh ingredients cooked in front of customer. Fantastic meats and delicious Spanish...More

review_data.title: Wonderful food, warm, friendly excellent service
review_data.content: One of the best restaurants in Zurich. Excellent food, extremely well prepared, great presentation with warm, friendly service. Very cozy, casual, approchable atmosphere, not pretentious at all! Make reservations, or you will be disappointed.

review_data.title: A refreshing and honest balance between food and wine
review_data.content: A top chef on hire for great creations, you can choose it heavy and stuffy if you like but I had today a four course dinner without any real carbs. Delicious, combined with a great taste if fine. Always worth a dip in and I...More

review_data.title: Great atmosphere, food & wine!
review_data.content: It is always a great experience to spend your evening at the Isebähnli. The Tartar is great and the Wine Cellar is full of exceptinal wines.

review_data.title: Us: "Hi, we reserved for 8." Them: "I'm sorry there's no room."
review_data.content: We didn't eat here and we will not try to eat here ever again. The service is worse than what you typically see in Swiss restaurants. We made a reservation for 8, got there on time, and got the answer that there was no room....More

review_data.title: The best in Zurich...not to be missed
review_data.content: My wife and I were lucky enough to wander into the Wystube Isebahnli a few years ago, and since then we have dined there at every opportunity. The food is creative and wonderful, and the wine list is world-class. It is small and cozy, and...More

review_data.title: We love Isebahnli
review_data.content: My wife and I have dinner at Isebahnli on a regular basis. The food is always good, the service always friendly, and the atmosphere very unique. Yücel (the owner) really tries to go the extra mile to make you enjoy your meal. Last year we...More

review_data.title: tiny restaurant, good food
review_data.content: A tiny restaurant (possibly can sit no more than 20) in a very old building. The food is very tasty, recommend house wine. Friendly staff.
